General.Name: Hubeiyichang Transportation Group Co Ltd
General.Description: Hubei Three Gorges Tourism Group Co., Ltd. provides passenger road transportation services in China. The company offers passenger travel services, passenger car 4S services, and commercial logistics services; taxi passenger transportation, car rental, bus station, vehicle extension and inspection, and catering services; and tourism services, including tourism transportation, sightseeing cruise, tourist port, travel agency, and tourist attraction services. It is also involved in the land development activities; and other business. In addition, the company sells vehicles and spare parts sale; and offers after-sales services. It operates 10 intercity buses; and 592 passenger vehicles, including urban and urban-rural buses. The company was formerly known as Hubei Yichang Transportation Group Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Hubei Three Gorges Tourism Group Co., Ltd. in July 2021. Hubei Three Gorges Tourism Group Co., Ltd. was founded in 1998 and is headquartered in Yichang, China.
